comments:
I've installed version 3.0.1 from the version 3.0 of the platform using the 
automatic upgrade functionality from the eclipse 3.0 platform.
After downloading and installing all components of this new version,
the platform asks to restart the platform.
After restarting the platform an exception is thrown and the platform does not
show up.

I would very much like to know how I can solve this problem quickly or 
reverse the upgrade in a simple manner, in order not to have to reinstall the 
platform version 3.0.

kind regards,


P.S. the log file indicating the exception contains the following:
